data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
data.quote: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.

data.author: Emily Dickinson
data.quote: Find ecstasy in life; the mere sense of living is joy enough.

data.author: Joan Rivers
data.quote: I enjoy life , I don’t care if it’s good things or bad things. That means you’re alive.

data.author: Sarah Louise Delany
data.quote: Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.

data.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.
data.quote: Life doesn’t require that we be the best, only that we try our best.

data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: There isn't a way things should be. There's just what happens, and what we do.

data.author: Carol Burnett
data.quote: Only I can change my life. NO one can do it for me.

data.author: Ayn Rand
data.quote: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.

data.author: Carl Sandburg
data.quote: To be a good loser is to learn how to win.

data.author: Norman Ralph Augustine
data.quote: Motivation will almost always beat mere talent.

data.author: Octavio Paz
data.quote: Deserve your dream.

data.author: John W. Gardner
data.quote: True happiness involves the full use of one's power and talent.

data.author: Virgil
data.quote: They can conquer who believe they can.

data.author: Philip Emeagwali
data.quote: The hardship that I encountered in the past will help me succeed in the future.

data.author: Saint Teresea of Avila
data.quote: Be gentle to all and stern with yourself.

data.author: Lucille Ball
data.quote: The more thing you do,the more you can do.

data.author: Baltasar Gracian
data.quote: The wise does at once what the fool does at last.

data.author: John Burroughs
data.quote: Leap, and net will appear.

data.author: Aeschylus
data.quote: God always strives together with those who strive.

data.author: Eliza Dushku
data.quote: Go big or go home.Because it's true. What do you have to lose?
